                     <div class="line">The plot of situation and the model,</div>
                     <div class="line">Consent upon a sure foundation,</div>
                     <div class="line">Question surveyors, know our own estate,</div>
                     <div class="line">How able such a work to undergo,</div>
                     <div class="line">To weigh against his opposite; or else</div>
                     <div class="line">We fortify in paper and in figures,</div>
                     <div class="line">Using the names of men instead of men:</div>
                     <div class="line">Like one that draws the model of a house</div>
                     <div class="line">Beyond his power to build it; who, half through,</div>
                     <div class="line">Gives o'er and leaves his part-created cost</div>
                     <div class="line">A naked subject to the weeping clouds</div>
                     <div class="line">And waste for churlish winter's tyranny.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HASTINGS</div>
                     <div class="line">Grant that our hopes, yet likely of fair birth,</div>
                     <div class="line">Should be still-born, and that we now possess'd</div>
                     <div class="line">The utmost man of expectation,</div>
                     <div class="line">I think we are a body strong enough,</div>
                     <div class="line">Even as we are, to equal with the king.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LORD BARDOLPH</div>
                     <div class="line">What, is the king but five and twenty thousand?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HASTINGS</div>
                     <div class="line">To us no more; nay, not so much, Lord Bardolph.</div>
                     <div class="line">For his divisions, as the times do brawl,</div>
                     <div class="line">Are in three heads: one power against the French,</div>
                     <div class="line">And one against Glendower; perforce a third</div>
                     <div class="line">Must take up us: so is the unfirm king</div>
                     <div class="line">In three divided; and his coffers sound</div>
                     <div class="line">With hollow poverty and emptiness.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ARCHBISHOP OF YORK</div>
                     <div class="line">That he should draw his several strengths together</div>
                     <div class="line">And come against us in full puissance,</div>
                     <div class="line">Need not be dreaded.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HASTINGS</div>
                     <div class="line">If he should do so,</div>
                     <div class="line">He leaves his back unarm'd, the French and Welsh</div>
                     <div class="line">Baying him at the heels: never fear that.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LORD BARDOLPH</div>
                     <div class="line">Who is it like should lead his forces hither?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HASTINGS</div>
                     <div class="line">The Duke of Lancaster and Westmoreland;</div>
                     <div class="line">Against the Welsh, himself and Harry Monmouth:</div>
                     <div class="line">But who is substituted 'gainst the French,</div>
                     <div class="line">I have no certain notice.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ARCHBISHOP OF YORK</div>
                     <div class="line">Let us on,</div>
                     <div class="line">And publish the occasion of our arms.</div>
                     <div class="line">The commonwealth is sick of their own choice;</div>
                     <div class="line">Their over-greedy love hath surfeited:</div>
                     <div class="line">An habitation giddy and unsure</div>
                     <div class="line">Hath he that buildeth on the vulgar heart.</div>
                     <div class="line">O thou fond many, with what loud applause</div>
                     <div class="line">Didst thou beat heaven with blessing Bolingbroke,</div>
                     <div class="line">Before he was what thou wouldst have him be!</div>
                     <div class="line">And being now trimm'd in thine own desires,</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou, beastly feeder, art so full of him,</div>
                     <div class="line">That thou provokest thyself to cast him up.</div>
                     <div class="line">So, so, thou common dog, didst thou disgorge</div>
                     <div class="line">Thy glutton bosom of the royal Richard;</div>
                     <div class="line">And now thou wouldst eat thy dead vomit up,</div>
                     <div class="line">And howl'st to find it. What trust is in</div>
                     <div class="line">these times?</div>
                     <div class="line">They that, when Richard lived, would have him die,</div>
                     <div class="line">Are now become enamour'd on his grave:</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou, that threw'st dust upon his goodly head</div>
                     <div class="line">When through proud London he came sighing on</div>
                     <div class="line">After the admired heels of Bolingbroke,</div>
                     <div class="line">Criest now 'O earth, yield us that king again,</div>
                     <div class="line">And take thou this!' O thoughts of men accursed!</div>
                     <div class="line">Past and to come seems best; things present worst.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MOWBRAY</div>
                     <div class="line">Shall we go draw our numbers and set on?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HASTINGS</div>
                     <div class="line">We are time's subjects, and time bids be gone.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
         </article>
         <article class="chapter" id="R.1.5">
            <header class="chapter-titlepage">
               <h2>Chapter 3. ACT II</h2>
            </header>
            <div class="lists-of-titles">
               <div class="toc">
                  <p>
                     <b>Table of Contents</b>
                  </p>
                  <ul class="toc">
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.5.2">1. SCENE I.  London. A street.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.5.3">2. SCENE II.  London. Another street.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.5.4">3. SCENE III.  Warkworth. Before the castle.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.5.5">4. SCENE IV.  London. The Boar's-head Tavern in Eastcheap.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                  </ul>
               </div>
            </div>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.5.2">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>1. SCENE I.  London. A street.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter MISTRESS QUICKLY, FANG and his Boy with her,
and SNARE following.</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                     <div class="line">Master Fang, have you entered the action?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FANG</div>
                     <div class="line">It is entered.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                     <div class="line">Where's your yeoman? Is't a lusty yeoman?</div>
                     <div class="line">Will a' stand to 't?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FANG</div>
                     <div class="line">Sirrah, where's Snare?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                     <div class="line">O Lord, ay! good Master Snare.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SNARE</div>
                     <div class="line">Here, here.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FANG</div>
                     <div class="line">Snare, we must arrest Sir John Falstaff.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                     <div class="line">Yea, good Master Snare; I have entered him</div>
                     <div class="line">and all.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SNARE</div>
                     <div class="line">It may chance cost some of us our lives, for</div>
                     <div class="line">he will stab.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                     <div class="line">Alas the day! take heed of him; he stabbed</div>
                     <div class="line">me in mine own house, and that most beastly: in good faith, he</div>
                     <div class="line">cares not what mischief he does. If his weapon be</div>
                     <div class="line">out: he will foin like any devil; he will spare neither</div>
                     <div class="line">man, woman, nor child.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FANG</div>
                     <div class="line">If I can close with him, I care not for his</div>
                     <div class="line">thrust.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                     <div class="line">No, nor I neither: I'll be at your elbow.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FANG</div>
                     <div class="line">An I but fist him once; an a' come but</div>
                     <div class="line">within my vice,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                     <div class="line">I am undone by his going; I warrant you,</div>
                     <div class="line">he's an infinitive thing upon my score. Good Master</div>
                     <div class="line">Fang, hold him sure: good Master Snare, let him</div>
                     <div class="line">not 'scape. A' comes continuantly to Pie-corner</div>
                     <div class="line">--saving your manhoods--to buy a saddle; and he is</div>
                     <div class="line">indited to dinner to the Lubber's-head in Lumbert</div>
                     <div class="line">street, to Master Smooth's the silkman: I pray ye,</div>
                     <div class="line">since my exion is entered and my case so openly</div>
                     <div class="line">known to the world, let him be brought in to his</div>
                     <div class="line">answer. A hundred mark is a long one for a poor lone</div>
                     <div class="line">woman to bear: and I have borne, and borne, and</div>
                     <div class="line">borne, and have been fubbed off, and fubbed off, and</div>
                     <div class="line">fubbed off, from this day to that day, that it is a</div>
                     <div class="line">shame to be thought on. There is no honesty in such</div>
                     <div class="line">dealing; unless a woman should be made an ass and a</div>
                     <div class="line">beast, to bear every knave's wrong.</div>
                     <div class="line">Yonder he comes; and that errant malmsey-nose knave,</div>
                     <div class="line">Bardolph, with him. Do your offices, do your</div>
                     <div class="line">offices: Master Fang and Master Snare, do me, do me,</div>
                     <div class="line">do me your offices.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>[Enter FALSTAFF, Page, and BARDOLPH]</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">How now! whose mare's dead? what's the matter?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FANG</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir John, I arrest you at the suit of Mistress Quickly.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Away, varlets! Draw, Bardolph: cut me off the</div>
                     <div class="line">villain's head: throw the quean in the channel.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                     <div class="line">Throw me in the channel! I'll throw thee in the</div>
                     <div class="line">channel. Wilt thou? wilt thou? thou bastardly</div>
                     <div class="line">rogue! Murder, murder! Ah, thou honeysuckle</div>
                     <div class="line">villain! wilt thou kill God's officers and the</div>
                     <div class="line">king's? Ah, thou honey-seed rogue! thou art a</div>
                     <div class="line">honey-seed, a man-queller, and a woman-queller.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Keep them off, Bardolph.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FANG</div>
                     <div class="line">A rescue! a rescue!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                     <div class="line">Good people, bring a rescue or two. Thou wo't, wo't</div>
                     <div class="line">thou? Thou wo't, wo't ta? do, do, thou rogue! do,</div>
                     <div class="line">thou hemp-seed!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Away, you scullion! you rampallion! You</div>
                     <div class="line">fustilarian! I'll tickle your catastrophe.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter the Lord Chief-Justice, and his men</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Lord Chief-Justice</div>
                     <div class="line">What is the matter? keep the peace here, ho!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                     <div class="line">Good my lord, be good to me. I beseech you, stand to me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Lord Chief-Justice</div>
                     <div class="line">How now, Sir John! what are you brawling here?</div>
                     <div class="line">Doth this become your place, your time and business?</div>
                     <div class="line">You should have been well on your way to York.</div>
                     <div class="line">Stand from him, fellow: wherefore hang'st upon him?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                     <div class="line">O most worshipful lord, an't please your grace, I am</div>
                     <div class="line">a poor widow of Eastcheap, and he is arrested at my suit.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Lord Chief-Justice</div>
                     <div class="line">For what sum?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                     <div class="line">It is more than for some, my lord; it is for all,</div>
                     <div class="line">all I have. He hath eaten me out of house and home;</div>
                     <div class="line">he hath put all my substance into that fat belly of</div>
                     <div class="line">his: but I will have some of it out again, or I</div>
                     <div class="line">will ride thee o' nights like the mare.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">I think I am as like to ride the mare, if I have</div>
                     <div class="line">any vantage of ground to get up.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Lord Chief-Justice</div>
                     <div class="line">How comes this, Sir John? Fie! what man of good</div>
                     <div class="line">temper would endure this tempest of exclamation?</div>
                     <div class="line">Are you not ashamed to enforce a poor widow to so</div>
                     <div class="line">rough a course to come by her own?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">What is the gross sum that I owe thee?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                     <div class="line">Marry, if thou wert an honest man, thyself and the</div>
                     <div class="line">money too. Thou didst swear to me upon a</div>
                     <div class="line">parcel-gilt goblet, sitting in my Dolphin-chamber,</div>
                     <div class="line">at the round table, by a sea-coal fire, upon</div>
                     <div class="line">Wednesday in Wheeson week, when the prince broke</div>
                     <div class="line">thy head for liking his father to a singing-man of</div>
                     <div class="line">Windsor, thou didst swear to me then, as I was</div>
                     <div class="line">washing thy wound, to marry me and make me my lady</div>
                     <div class="line">thy wife. Canst thou deny it? Did not goodwife</div>
                     <div class="line">Keech, the butcher's wife, come in then and call me</div>
                     <div class="line">gossip Quickly? coming in to borrow a mess of</div>
                     <div class="line">vinegar; telling us she had a good dish of prawns;</div>
                     <div class="line">whereby thou didst desire to eat some; whereby I</div>
                     <div class="line">told thee they were ill for a green wound? And</div>
                     <div class="line">didst thou not, when she was gone down stairs,</div>
                     <div class="line">desire me to be no more so familiarity with such</div>
                     <div class="line">poor people; saying that ere long they should call</div>
                     <div class="line">me madam? And didst thou not kiss me and bid me</div>
                     <div class="line">fetch thee thirty shillings? I put thee now to thy</div>
                     <div class="line">book-oath: deny it, if thou canst.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">My lord, this is a poor mad soul; and she says up</div>
                     <div class="line">and down the town that the eldest son is like you:</div>
                     <div class="line">she hath been in good case, and the truth is,</div>
                     <div class="line">poverty hath distracted her. But for these foolish</div>
                     <div class="line">officers, I beseech you I may have redress against them.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Lord Chief-Justice</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir John, Sir John, I am well acquainted with your</div>
                     <div class="line">manner of wrenching the true cause the false way. It</div>
                     <div class="line">is not a confident brow, nor the throng of words</div>
                     <div class="line">that come with such more than impudent sauciness</div>
                     <div class="line">from you, can thrust me from a level consideration:</div>
                     <div class="line">you have, as it appears to me, practised upon the</div>
                     <div class="line">easy-yielding spirit of this woman, and made her</div>
                     <div class="line">serve your uses both in purse and in person.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                     <div class="line">Yea, in truth, my lord.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Lord Chief-Justice</div>
                     <div class="line">Pray thee, peace. Pay her the debt you owe her, and</div>
                     <div class="line">unpay the villany you have done her: the one you</div>
                     <div class="line">may do with sterling money, and the other with</div>
                     <div class="line">current repentance.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">My lord, I will not undergo this sneap without</div>
                     <div class="line">reply. You call honourable boldness impudent</div>
                     <div class="line">sauciness: if a man will make courtesy and say</div>
                     <div class="line">nothing, he is virtuous: no, my lord, my humble</div>
                     <div class="line">duty remembered, I will not be your suitor. I say</div>
                     <div class="line">to you, I do desire deliverance from these officers,</div>
                     <div class="line">being upon hasty employment in the king's affairs.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Lord Chief-Justice</div>
                     <div class="line">You speak as having power to do wrong: but answer</div>
                     <div class="line">in the effect of your reputation, and satisfy this</div>
                     <div class="line">poor woman.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Come hither, hostess.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter GOWER</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Lord Chief-Justice</div>
                     <div class="line">Now, Master Gower, what news?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GOWER</div>
                     <div class="line">The king, my lord, and Harry Prince of Wales</div>
                     <div class="line">Are near at hand: the rest the paper tells.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">As I am a gentleman.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                     <div class="line">Faith, you said so before.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">As I am a gentleman. Come, no more words of it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                     <div class="line">By this heavenly ground I tread on, I must be fain</div>
                     <div class="line">to pawn both my plate and the tapestry of my</div>
                     <div class="line">dining-chambers.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Glasses, glasses is the only drinking: and for thy</div>
                     <div class="line">walls, a pretty slight drollery, or the story of</div>
                     <div class="line">the Prodigal, or the German hunting in water-work,</div>
                     <div class="line">is worth a thousand of these bed-hangings and these</div>
                     <div class="line">fly-bitten tapestries. Let it be ten pound, if thou</div>
                     <div class="line">canst. Come, an 'twere not for thy humours, there's</div>
                     <div class="line">not a better wench in England. Go, wash thy face,</div>
                     <div class="line">and draw the action. Come, thou must not be in</div>
                     <div class="line">this humour with me; dost not know me? come, come, I</div>
                     <div class="line">know thou wast set on to this.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                     <div class="line">Pray thee, Sir John, let it be but twenty nobles: i'</div>
                     <div class="line">faith, I am loath to pawn my plate, so God save me,</div>
                     <div class="line">la!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Let it alone; I'll make other shift: you'll be a</div>
                     <div class="line">fool still.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, you shall have it, though I pawn my gown. I</div>
                     <div class="line">hope you'll come to supper. You'll pay me all together?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Will I live?</div>
                     <p>To BARDOLPH</p>
                     <div class="line">Go, with her, with her; hook on, hook on.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                     <div class="line">Will you have Doll Tearsheet meet you at supper?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">No more words; let's have her.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt MISTRESS QUICKLY, BARDOLPH, Officers and Boy</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Lord Chief-Justice</div>
                     <div class="line">I have heard better news.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">What's the news, my lord?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Lord Chief-Justice</div>
                     <div class="line">Where lay the king last night?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GOWER</div>
                     <div class="line">At Basingstoke, my lord.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">I hope, my lord, all's well: what is the news, my lord?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Lord Chief-Justice</div>
                     <div class="line">Come all his forces back?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GOWER</div>
                     <div class="line">No; fifteen hundred foot, five hundred horse,</div>
                     <div class="line">Are marched up to my lord of Lancaster,</div>
                     <div class="line">Against Northumberland and the Archbishop.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Comes the king back from Wales, my noble lord?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Lord Chief-Justice</div>
                     <div class="line">You shall have letters of me presently:</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, go along with me, good Master Gower.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">My lord!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Lord Chief-Justice</div>
                     <div class="line">What's the matter?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Master Gower, shall I entreat you with me to dinner?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GOWER</div>
                     <div class="line">I must wait upon my good lord here; I thank you,</div>
                     <div class="line">good Sir John.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Lord Chief-Justice</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir John, you loiter here too long, being you are to</div>
                     <div class="line">take soldiers up in counties as you go.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Will you sup with me, Master Gower?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Lord Chief-Justice</div>
                     <div class="line">What foolish master taught you these manners, Sir John?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Master Gower, if they become me not, he was a fool</div>
                     <div class="line">that taught them me. This is the right fencing</div>
                     <div class="line">grace, my lord; tap for tap, and so part fair.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Lord Chief-Justice</div>
                     <div class="line">Now the Lord lighten thee! thou art a great fool.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.5.3">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>2. SCENE II.  London. Another street.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter PRINCE HENRY and POINS</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                     <div class="line">Before God, I am exceeding weary.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                     <div class="line">Is't come to that? I had thought weariness durst not</div>
                     <div class="line">have attached one of so high blood.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                     <div class="line">Faith, it does me; though it discolours the</div>
                     <div class="line">complexion of my greatness to acknowledge it. Doth</div>
                     <div class="line">it not show vilely in me to desire small beer?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, a prince should not be so loosely studied as</div>
                     <div class="line">to remember so weak a composition.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                     <div class="line">Belike then my appetite was not princely got; for,</div>
                     <div class="line">by my troth, I do now remember the poor creature,</div>
                     <div class="line">small beer. But, indeed, these humble</div>
                     <div class="line">considerations make me out of love with my</div>
                     <div class="line">greatness. What a disgrace is it to me to remember</div>
                     <div class="line">thy name! or to know thy face to-morrow! or to</div>
                     <div class="line">take note how many pair of silk stockings thou</div>
                     <div class="line">hast, viz. these, and those that were thy</div>
                     <div class="line">peach-coloured ones! or to bear the inventory of thy</div>
                     <div class="line">shirts, as, one for superfluity, and another for</div>
                     <div class="line">use! But that the tennis-court-keeper knows better</div>
                     <div class="line">than I; for it is a low ebb of linen with thee when</div>
                     <div class="line">thou keepest not racket there; as thou hast not done</div>
                     <div class="line">a great while, because the rest of thy low</div>
                     <div class="line">countries have made a shift to eat up thy holland:</div>
                     <div class="line">and God knows, whether those that bawl out the ruins</div>
                     <div class="line">of thy linen shall inherit his kingdom: but the</div>
                     <div class="line">midwives say the children are not in the fault;</div>
                     <div class="line">whereupon the world increases, and kindreds are</div>
                     <div class="line">mightily strengthened.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                     <div class="line">How ill it follows, after you have laboured so hard,</div>
                     <div class="line">you should talk so idly! Tell me, how many good</div>
                     <div class="line">young princes would do so, their fathers being so</div>
                     <div class="line">sick as yours at this time is?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                     <div class="line">Shall I tell thee one thing, Poins?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                     <div class="line">Yes, faith; and let it be an excellent good thing.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                     <div class="line">It shall serve among wits of no higher breeding than thine.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                     <div class="line">Go to; I stand the push of your one thing that you</div>
                     <div class="line">will tell.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                     <div class="line">Marry, I tell thee, it is not meet that I should be</div>
                     <div class="line">sad, now my father is sick: albeit I could tell</div>
                     <div class="line">thee, as to one it pleases me, for fault of a</div>
                     <div class="line">better, to call my friend, I could be sad, and sad</div>
                     <div class="line">indeed too.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                     <div class="line">Very hardly upon such a subject.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                     <div class="line">By this hand thou thinkest me as far in the devil's</div>
                     <div class="line">book as thou and Falstaff for obduracy and</div>
                     <div class="line">persistency: let the end try the man. But I tell</div>
                     <div class="line">thee, my heart bleeds inwardly that my father is so</div>
                     <div class="line">sick: and keeping such vile company as thou art</div>
                     <div class="line">hath in reason taken from me all ostentation of sorrow.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                     <div class="line">The reason?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                     <div class="line">What wouldst thou think of me, if I should weep?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                     <div class="line">I would think thee a most princely hypocrite.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                     <div class="line">It would be every man's thought; and thou art a</div>
                     <div class="line">blessed fellow to think as every man thinks: never</div>
                     <div class="line">a man's thought in the world keeps the road-way</div>
                     <div class="line">better than thine: every man would think me an</div>
                     <div class="line">hypocrite indeed. And what accites your most</div>
                     <div class="line">worshipful thought to think so?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, because you have been so lewd and so much</div>
                     <div class="line">engraffed to Falstaff.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                     <div class="line">And to thee.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                     <div class="line">By this light, I am well spoke on; I can hear it</div>
                     <div class="line">with my own ears: the worst that they can say of</div>
                     <div class="line">me is that I am a second brother and that I am a</div>
                     <div class="line">proper fellow of my hands; and those two things, I</div>
                     <div class="line">confess, I cannot help. By the mass, here comes Bardolph.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter BARDOLPH and Page</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                     <div class="line">And the boy that I gave Falstaff: a' had him from</div>
                     <div class="line">me Christian; and look, if the fat villain have not</div>
                     <div class="line">transformed him ape.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                     <div class="line">God save your grace!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                     <div class="line">And yours, most noble Bardolph!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, you virtuous ass, you bashful fool, must you</div>
                     <div class="line">be blushing? wherefore blush you now? What a</div>
                     <div class="line">maidenly man-at-arms are you become! Is't such a</div>
                     <div class="line">matter to get a pottle-pot's maidenhead?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Page</div>
                     <div class="line">A' calls me e'en now, my lord, through a red</div>
                     <div class="line">lattice, and I could discern no part of his face</div>
                     <div class="line">from the window: at last I spied his eyes, and</div>
                     <div class="line">methought he had made two holes in the ale-wife's</div>
                     <div class="line">new petticoat and so peeped through.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                     <div class="line">Has not the boy profited?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                     <div class="line">Away, you whoreson upright rabbit, away!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Page</div>
                     <div class="line">Away, you rascally Althaea's dream, away!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                     <div class="line">Instruct us, boy; what dream, boy?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Page</div>
                     <div class="line">Marry, my lord, Althaea dreamed she was delivered</div>
                     <div class="line">of a fire-brand; and therefore I call him her dream.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                     <div class="line">A crown's worth of good interpretation: there 'tis,</div>
                     <div class="line">boy.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                     <div class="line">O, that this good blossom could be kept from</div>
                     <div class="line">cankers! Well, there is sixpence to preserve thee.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                     <div class="line">An you do not make him hanged among you, the</div>
                     <div class="line">gallows shall have wrong.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                     <div class="line">And how doth thy master, Bardolph?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, my lord. He heard of your grace's coming to</div>
                     <div class="line">town: there's a letter for you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                     <div class="line">Delivered with good respect. And how doth the</div>
                     <div class="line">martlemas, your master?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                     <div class="line">In bodily health, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                     <div class="line">Marry, the immortal part needs a physician; but</div>
                     <div class="line">that moves not him: though that be sick, it dies</div>
                     <div class="line">not.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                     <div class="line">I do allow this wen to be as familiar with me as my</div>
                     <div class="line">dog; and he holds his place; for look you how be writes.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Reads</span>  'John Falstaff, knight,'--every man must</div>
                     <div class="line">know that, as oft as he has occasion to name</div>
                     <div class="line">himself: even like those that are kin to the king;</div>
                     <div class="line">for they never prick their finger but they say,</div>
                     <div class="line">'There's some of the king's blood spilt.' 'How</div>
                     <div class="line">comes that?' says he, that takes upon him not to</div>
                     <div class="line">conceive. The answer is as ready as a borrower's</div>
                     <div class="line">cap, 'I am the king's poor cousin, sir.'</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, they will be kin to us, or they will fetch it</div>
                     <div class="line">from Japhet. But to the letter.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Reads</span>  'Sir John Falstaff, knight, to the son of</div>
                     <div class="line">the king, nearest his father, Harry Prince of</div>
                     <div class="line">Wales, greeting.' Why, this is a certificate.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                     <div class="line">Peace!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Reads</span>  'I will imitate the honourable Romans in</div>
                     <div class="line">brevity:' he sure means brevity in breath,</div>
                     <div class="line">short-winded. 'I commend me to thee, I commend</div>
                     <div class="line">thee, and I leave thee. Be not too familiar with</div>
                     <div class="line">Poins; for he misuses thy favours so much, that he</div>
                     <div class="line">swears thou art to marry his sister Nell. Repent</div>
                     <div class="line">at idle times as thou mayest; and so, farewell.</div>
                     <div class="line">Thine, by yea and no, which is as much as to</div>
                     <div class="line">say, as thou usest him, JACK FALSTAFF with my</div>
                     <div class="line">familiars, JOHN with my brothers and sisters,</div>
                     <div class="line">and SIR JOHN with all Europe.'</div>
                     <div class="line">My lord, I'll steep this letter in sack and make him eat it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                     <div class="line">That's to make him eat twenty of his words. But do</div>
                     <div class="line">you use me thus, Ned? must I marry your sister?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                     <div class="line">God send the wench no worse fortune! But I never said so.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, thus we play the fools with the time, and the</div>
                     <div class="line">spirits of the wise sit in the clouds and mock us.</div>
                     <div class="line">Is your master here in London?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                     <div class="line">Yea, my lord.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                     <div class="line">Where sups he? doth the old boar feed in the old frank?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                     <div class="line">At the old place, my lord, in Eastcheap.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                     <div class="line">What company?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Page</div>
                     <div class="line">Ephesians, my lord, of the old church.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                     <div class="line">Sup any women with him?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Page</div>
                     <div class="line">None, my lord, but old Mistress Quickly and</div>
                     <div class="line">Mistress Doll Tearsheet.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                     <div class="line">What pagan may that be?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Page</div>
                     <div class="line">A proper gentlewoman, sir, and a kinswoman of my master's.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                     <div class="line">Even such kin as the parish heifers are to the town</div>
                     <div class="line">bull. Shall we steal upon them, Ned, at supper?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                     <div class="line">I am your shadow, my lord; I'll follow you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                     <div class="line">Sirrah, you boy, and Bardolph, no word to your</div>
                     <div class="line">master that I am yet come to town: there's for</div>
                     <div class="line">your silence.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                     <div class="line">I have no tongue, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Page</div>
                     <div class="line">And for mine, sir, I will govern it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                     <div class="line">Fare you well; go.</div>
                     <p>Exeunt BARDOLPH and Page</p>
                     <div class="line">This Doll Tearsheet should be some road.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                     <div class="line">I warrant you, as common as the way between Saint</div>
                     <div class="line">Alban's and London.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                     <div class="line">How might we see Falstaff bestow himself to-night</div>
                     <div class="line">in his true colours, and not ourselves be seen?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POINS</div>
                     <div class="line">Put on two leathern jerkins and aprons, and wait</div>
                     <div class="line">upon him at his table as drawers.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE HENRY</div>
                     <div class="line">From a God to a bull? a heavy decension! it was</div>
                     <div class="line">Jove's case. From a prince to a prentice? a low</div>
                     <div class="line">transformation! that shall be mine; for in every</div>
                     <div class="line">thing the purpose must weigh with the folly.</div>
                     <div class="line">Follow me, Ned.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.5.4">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>3. SCENE III.  Warkworth. Before the castle.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter NORTHUMBERLAND, LADY NORTHUMBERLAND, and LADY PERCY</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">NORTHUMBERLAND</div>
                     <div class="line">I pray thee, loving wife, and gentle daughter,</div>
                     <div class="line">Give even way unto my rough affairs:</div>
                     <div class="line">Put not you on the visage of the times</div>
                     <div class="line">And be like them to Percy troublesome.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY NORTHUMBERLAND</div>
                     <div class="line">I have given over, I will speak no more:</div>
                     <div class="line">Do what you will; your wisdom be your guide.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">NORTHUMBERLAND</div>
                     <div class="line">Alas, sweet wife, my honour is at pawn;</div>
                     <div class="line">And, but my going, nothing can redeem it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY PERCY</div>
                     <div class="line">O yet, for God's sake, go not to these wars!</div>
                     <div class="line">The time was, father, that you broke your word,</div>
                     <div class="line">When you were more endeared to it than now;</div>
                     <div class="line">When your own Percy, when my heart's dear Harry,</div>
                     <div class="line">Threw many a northward look to see his father</div>
                     <div class="line">Bring up his powers; but he did long in vain.</div>
                     <div class="line">Who then persuaded you to stay at home?</div>
                     <div class="line">There were two honours lost, yours and your son's.</div>
                     <div class="line">For yours, the God of heaven brighten it!</div>
                     <div class="line">For his, it stuck upon him as the sun</div>
                     <div class="line">In the grey vault of heaven, and by his light</div>
                     <div class="line">Did all the chivalry of England move</div>
                     <div class="line">To do brave acts: he was indeed the glass</div>
                     <div class="line">Wherein the noble youth did dress themselves:</div>
                     <div class="line">He had no legs that practised not his gait;</div>
                     <div class="line">And speaking thick, which nature made his blemish,</div>
                     <div class="line">Became the accents of the valiant;</div>
                     <div class="line">For those that could speak low and tardily</div>
                     <div class="line">Would turn their own perfection to abuse,</div>
                     <div class="line">To seem like him: so that in speech, in gait,</div>
                     <div class="line">In diet, in affections of delight,</div>
                     <div class="line">In military rules, humours of blood,</div>
                     <div class="line">He was the mark and glass, copy and book,</div>
                     <div class="line">That fashion'd others. And him, O wondrous him!</div>
                     <div class="line">O miracle of men! him did you leave,</div>
                     <div class="line">Second to none, unseconded by you,</div>
                     <div class="line">To look upon the hideous god of war</div>
                     <div class="line">In disadvantage; to abide a field</div>
                     <div class="line">Where nothing but the sound of Hotspur's name</div>
                     <div class="line">Did seem defensible: so you left him.</div>
                     <div class="line">Never, O never, do his ghost the wrong</div>
                     <div class="line">To hold your honour more precise and nice</div>
                     <div class="line">With others than with him! let them alone:</div>
                     <div class="line">The marshal and the archbishop are strong:</div>
                     <div class="line">Had my sweet Harry had but half their numbers,</div>
                     <div class="line">To-day might I, hanging on Hotspur's neck,</div>
                     <div class="line">Have talk'd of Monmouth's grave.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">NORTHUMBERLAND</div>
                     <div class="line">Beshrew your heart,</div>
                     <div class="line">Fair daughter, you do draw my spirits from me</div>
                     <div class="line">With new lamenting ancient oversights.</div>
                     <div class="line">But I must go and meet with danger there,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or it will seek me in another place</div>
                     <div class="line">And find me worse provided.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY NORTHUMBERLAND</div>
                     <div class="line">O, fly to Scotland,</div>
                     <div class="line">Till that the nobles and the armed commons</div>
                     <div class="line">Have of their puissance made a little taste.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LADY PERCY</div>
                     <div class="line">If they get ground and vantage of the king,</div>
                     <div class="line">Then join you with them, like a rib of steel,</div>
                     <div class="line">To make strength stronger; but, for all our loves,</div>
                     <div class="line">First let them try themselves. So did your son;</div>
                     <div class="line">He was so suffer'd: so came I a widow;</div>
                     <div class="line">And never shall have length of life enough</div>
                     <div class="line">To rain upon remembrance with mine eyes,</div>
                     <div class="line">That it may grow and sprout as high as heaven,</div>
                     <div class="line">For recordation to my noble husband.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">NORTHUMBERLAND</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, come, go in with me. 'Tis with my mind</div>
                     <div class="line">As with the tide swell'd up unto his height,</div>
                     <div class="line">That makes a still-stand, running neither way:</div>
                     <div class="line">Fain would I go to meet the archbishop,</div>
                     <div class="line">But many thousand reasons hold me back.</div>
                     <div class="line">I will resolve for Scotland: there am I,</div>
                     <div class="line">Till time and vantage crave my company.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.5.5">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>4. SCENE IV.  London. The Boar's-head Tavern in Eastcheap.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter two Drawers</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">First Drawer</div>
                     <div class="line">What the devil hast thou brought there? apple-johns?</div>
                     <div class="line">thou knowest Sir John cannot endure an apple-john.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Second Drawer</div>
                     <div class="line">Mass, thou sayest true. The prince once set a dish</div>
                     <div class="line">of apple-johns before him, and told him there were</div>
                     <div class="line">five more Sir Johns, and, putting off his hat, said</div>
                     <div class="line">'I will now take my leave of these six dry, round,</div>
                     <div class="line">old, withered knights.' It angered him to the</div>
                     <div class="line">heart: but he hath forgot that.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">First Drawer</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, then, cover, and set them down: and see if</div>
                     <div class="line">thou canst find out Sneak's noise; Mistress</div>
                     <div class="line">Tearsheet would fain hear some music. Dispatch: the</div>
                     <div class="line">room where they supped is too hot; they'll come in straight.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Second Drawer</div>
                     <div class="line">Sirrah, here will be the prince and Master Poins</div>
                     <div class="line">anon; and they will put on two of our jerkins and</div>
                     <div class="line">aprons; and Sir John must not know of it: Bardolph</div>
                     <div class="line">hath brought word.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">First Drawer</div>
                     <div class="line">By the mass, here will be old Utis: it will be an</div>
                     <div class="line">excellent stratagem.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Second Drawer</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll see if I can find out Sneak.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <p>Enter MISTRESS QUICKLY and DOLL TEARSHEET</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                     <div class="line">I' faith, sweetheart, methinks now you are in an</div>
                     <div class="line">excellent good temperality: your pulsidge beats as</div>
                     <div class="line">extraordinarily as heart would desire; and your</div>
                     <div class="line">colour, I warrant you, is as red as any rose, in good</div>
                     <div class="line">truth, la! But, i' faith, you have drunk too much</div>
                     <div class="line">canaries; and that's a marvellous searching wine,</div>
                     <div class="line">and it perfumes the blood ere one can say 'What's</div>
                     <div class="line">this?' How do you now?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DOLL TEARSHEET</div>
                     <div class="line">Better than I was: hem!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, that's well said; a good heart's worth gold.</div>
                     <div class="line">Lo, here comes Sir John.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter FALSTAFF</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Singing</span>  'When Arthur first in court,'</div>
                     <div class="line">--Empty the jordan.</div>
                     <p>Exit First Drawer</p>
                     <p>Singing</p>
                     <div class="line">--'And was a worthy king.' How now, Mistress Doll!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                     <div class="line">Sick of a calm; yea, good faith.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">So is all her sect; an they be once in a calm, they are sick.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DOLL TEARSHEET</div>
                     <div class="line">You muddy rascal, is that all the comfort you give me?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
