                              <div class="line">When tempest of commotion, like the south</div>
                              <div class="line">Borne with black vapour, doth begin to melt</div>
                              <div class="line">And drop upon our bare unarmed heads.</div>
                              <div class="line">Give me my sword and cloak. Falstaff, good night.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt PRINCE HENRY, POINS, PETO and BARDOLPH</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Now comes in the sweetest morsel of the night, and</div>
                              <div class="line">we must hence and leave it unpicked.</div>
                              <p>Knocking within</p>
                              <div class="line">More knocking at the door!</div>
                              <p>Re-enter BARDOLPH</p>
                              <div class="line">How now! what's the matter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">You must away to court, sir, presently;</div>
                              <div class="line">A dozen captains stay at door for you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>To the Page</span>  Pay the musicians, sirrah. Farewell,</div>
                              <div class="line">hostess; farewell, Doll. You see, my good wenches,</div>
                              <div class="line">how men of merit are sought after: the undeserver</div>
                              <div class="line">may sleep, when the man of action is called on.</div>
                              <div class="line">Farewell good wenches: if I be not sent away post,</div>
                              <div class="line">I will see you again ere I go.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOLL TEARSHEET</div>
                              <div class="line">I cannot speak; if my heart be not read to burst,--</div>
                              <div class="line">well, sweet Jack, have a care of thyself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Farewell, farewell.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt FALSTAFF and BARDOLPH</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, fare thee well: I have known thee these</div>
                              <div class="line">twenty-nine years, come peascod-time; but an</div>
                              <div class="line">honester and truer-hearted man,--well, fare thee well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  Mistress Tearsheet!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">What's the matter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  Good Mistress Tearsheet, come to my master.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">O, run, Doll, run; run, good Doll: come.</div>
                              <p>She comes blubbered</p>
                              <div class="line">Yea, will you come, Doll?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.6">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 4. ACT III</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.2">1. SCENE I.  Westminster. The palace.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.3">2. SCENE II.  Gloucestershire. Before SHALLOW'S house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  Westminster. The palace.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter KING HENRY IV in his nightgown, with a Page</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY IV</div>
                              <div class="line">Go call the Earls of Surrey and of Warwick;</div>
                              <div class="line">But, ere they come, bid them o'er-read these letters,</div>
                              <div class="line">And well consider of them; make good speed.</div>
                              <p>Exit Page</p>
                              <div class="line">How many thousand of my poorest subjects</div>
                              <div class="line">Are at this hour asleep! O sleep, O gentle sleep,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nature's soft nurse, how have I frighted thee,</div>
                              <div class="line">That thou no more wilt weigh my eyelids down</div>
                              <div class="line">And steep my senses in forgetfulness?</div>
                              <div class="line">Why rather, sleep, liest thou in smoky cribs,</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon uneasy pallets stretching thee</div>
                              <div class="line">And hush'd with buzzing night-flies to thy slumber,</div>
                              <div class="line">Than in the perfumed chambers of the great,</div>
                              <div class="line">Under the canopies of costly state,</div>
                              <div class="line">And lull'd with sound of sweetest melody?</div>
                              <div class="line">O thou dull god, why liest thou with the vile</div>
                              <div class="line">In loathsome beds, and leavest the kingly couch</div>
                              <div class="line">A watch-case or a common 'larum-bell?</div>
                              <div class="line">Wilt thou upon the high and giddy mast</div>
                              <div class="line">Seal up the ship-boy's eyes, and rock his brains</div>
                              <div class="line">In cradle of the rude imperious surge</div>
                              <div class="line">And in the visitation of the winds,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who take the ruffian billows by the top,</div>
                              <div class="line">Curling their monstrous heads and hanging them</div>
                              <div class="line">With deafening clamour in the slippery clouds,</div>
                              <div class="line">That, with the hurly, death itself awakes?</div>
                              <div class="line">Canst thou, O partial sleep, give thy repose</div>
                              <div class="line">To the wet sea-boy in an hour so rude,</div>
                              <div class="line">And in the calmest and most stillest night,</div>
                              <div class="line">With all appliances and means to boot,</div>
                              <div class="line">Deny it to a king? Then happy low, lie down!</div>
                              <div class="line">Uneasy lies the head that wears a crown.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter WARWICK and SURREY</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WARWICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Many good morrows to your majesty!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY IV</div>
                              <div class="line">Is it good morrow, lords?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WARWICK</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis one o'clock, and past.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY IV</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, then, good morrow to you all, my lords.</div>
                              <div class="line">Have you read o'er the letters that I sent you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WARWICK</div>
                              <div class="line">We have, my liege.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY IV</div>
                              <div class="line">Then you perceive the body of our kingdom</div>
                              <div class="line">How foul it is; what rank diseases grow</div>
                              <div class="line">And with what danger, near the heart of it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WARWICK</div>
                              <div class="line">It is but as a body yet distemper'd;</div>
                              <div class="line">Which to his former strength may be restored</div>
                              <div class="line">With good advice and little medicine:</div>
                              <div class="line">My Lord Northumberland will soon be cool'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY IV</div>
                              <div class="line">O God! that one might read the book of fate,</div>
                              <div class="line">And see the revolution of the times</div>
                              <div class="line">Make mountains level, and the continent,</div>
                              <div class="line">Weary of solid firmness, melt itself</div>
                              <div class="line">Into the sea! and, other times, to see</div>
                              <div class="line">The beachy girdle of the ocean</div>
                              <div class="line">Too wide for Neptune's hips; how chances mock,</div>
                              <div class="line">And changes fill the cup of alteration</div>
                              <div class="line">With divers liquors! O, if this were seen,</div>
                              <div class="line">The happiest youth, viewing his progress through,</div>
                              <div class="line">What perils past, what crosses to ensue,</div>
                              <div class="line">Would shut the book, and sit him down and die.</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis not 'ten years gone</div>
                              <div class="line">Since Richard and Northumberland, great friends,</div>
                              <div class="line">Did feast together, and in two years after</div>
                              <div class="line">Were they at wars: it is but eight years since</div>
                              <div class="line">This Percy was the man nearest my soul,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who like a brother toil'd in my affairs</div>
                              <div class="line">And laid his love and life under my foot,</div>
                              <div class="line">Yea, for my sake, even to the eyes of Richard</div>
                              <div class="line">Gave him defiance. But which of you was by--</div>
                              <div class="line">You, cousin Nevil, as I may remember--</div>
                              <p>To WARWICK</p>
                              <div class="line">When Richard, with his eye brimful of tears,</div>
                              <div class="line">Then cheque'd and rated by Northumberland,</div>
                              <div class="line">Did speak these words, now proved a prophecy?</div>
                              <div class="line">'Northumberland, thou ladder by the which</div>
                              <div class="line">My cousin Bolingbroke ascends my throne;'</div>
                              <div class="line">Though then, God knows, I had no such intent,</div>
                              <div class="line">But that necessity so bow'd the state</div>
                              <div class="line">That I and greatness were compell'd to kiss:</div>
                              <div class="line">'The time shall come,' thus did he follow it,</div>
                              <div class="line">'The time will come, that foul sin, gathering head,</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall break into corruption:' so went on,</div>
                              <div class="line">Foretelling this same time's condition</div>
                              <div class="line">And the division of our amity.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WARWICK</div>
                              <div class="line">There is a history in all men's lives,</div>
                              <div class="line">Figuring the nature of the times deceased;</div>
                              <div class="line">The which observed, a man may prophesy,</div>
                              <div class="line">With a near aim, of the main chance of things</div>
                              <div class="line">As yet not come to life, which in their seeds</div>
                              <div class="line">And weak beginnings lie intreasured.</div>
                              <div class="line">Such things become the hatch and brood of time;</div>
                              <div class="line">And by the necessary form of this</div>
                              <div class="line">King Richard might create a perfect guess</div>
                              <div class="line">That great Northumberland, then false to him,</div>
                              <div class="line">Would of that seed grow to a greater falseness;</div>
                              <div class="line">Which should not find a ground to root upon,</div>
                              <div class="line">Unless on you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY IV</div>
                              <div class="line">Are these things then necessities?</div>
                              <div class="line">Then let us meet them like necessities:</div>
                              <div class="line">And that same word even now cries out on us:</div>
                              <div class="line">They say the bishop and Northumberland</div>
                              <div class="line">Are fifty thousand strong.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WARWICK</div>
                              <div class="line">It cannot be, my lord;</div>
                              <div class="line">Rumour doth double, like the voice and echo,</div>
                              <div class="line">The numbers of the fear'd. Please it your grace</div>
                              <div class="line">To go to bed. Upon my soul, my lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">The powers that you already have sent forth</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall bring this prize in very easily.</div>
                              <div class="line">To comfort you the more, I have received</div>
                              <div class="line">A certain instance that Glendower is dead.</div>
                              <div class="line">Your majesty hath been this fortnight ill,</div>
                              <div class="line">And these unseason'd hours perforce must add</div>
                              <div class="line">Unto your sickness.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY IV</div>
                              <div class="line">I will take your counsel:</div>
                              <div class="line">And were these inward wars once out of hand,</div>
                              <div class="line">We would, dear lords, unto the Holy Land.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  Gloucestershire. Before SHALLOW'S house.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter SHALLOW and SILENCE, meeting; MOULDY,
SHADOW, WART, FEEBLE, BULLCALF, a Servant or two
with them</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Come on, come on, come on, sir; give me your hand,</div>
                              <div class="line">sir, give me your hand, sir: an early stirrer, by</div>
                              <div class="line">the rood! And how doth my good cousin Silence?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SILENCE</div>
                              <div class="line">Good morrow, good cousin Shallow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">And how doth my cousin, your bedfellow? and your</div>
                              <div class="line">fairest daughter and mine, my god-daughter Ellen?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SILENCE</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, a black ousel, cousin Shallow!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">By yea and nay, sir, I dare say my cousin William is</div>
                              <div class="line">become a good scholar: he is at Oxford still, is he not?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SILENCE</div>
                              <div class="line">Indeed, sir, to my cost.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">A' must, then, to the inns o' court shortly. I was</div>
                              <div class="line">once of Clement's Inn, where I think they will</div>
                              <div class="line">talk of mad Shallow yet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SILENCE</div>
                              <div class="line">You were called 'lusty Shallow' then, cousin.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">By the mass, I was called any thing; and I would</div>
                              <div class="line">have done any thing indeed too, and roundly too.</div>
                              <div class="line">There was I, and little John Doit of Staffordshire,</div>
                              <div class="line">and black George Barnes, and Francis Pickbone, and</div>
                              <div class="line">Will Squele, a Cotswold man; you had not four such</div>
                              <div class="line">swinge-bucklers in all the inns o' court again: and</div>
                              <div class="line">I may say to you, we knew where the bona-robas were</div>
                              <div class="line">and had the best of them all at commandment. Then</div>
                              <div class="line">was Jack Falstaff, now Sir John, a boy, and page to</div>
                              <div class="line">Thomas Mowbray, Duke of Norfolk.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SILENCE</div>
                              <div class="line">This Sir John, cousin, that comes hither anon about soldiers?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">The same Sir John, the very same. I  see him break</div>
                              <div class="line">Skogan's head at the court-gate, when a' was a</div>
                              <div class="line">crack not thus high: and the very same day did I</div>
                              <div class="line">fight with one Sampson Stockfish, a fruiterer,</div>
                              <div class="line">behind Gray's Inn. Jesu, Jesu, the mad days that I</div>
                              <div class="line">have spent! and to see how many of my old</div>
                              <div class="line">acquaintance are dead!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SILENCE</div>
                              <div class="line">We shall all follow, cousin.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHADOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Certain, 'tis certain; very sure, very sure: death,</div>
                              <div class="line">as the Psalmist saith, is certain to all; all shall</div>
                              <div class="line">die. How a good yoke of bullocks at Stamford fair?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SILENCE</div>
                              <div class="line">By my troth, I was not there.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Death is certain. Is old Double of your town living</div>
                              <div class="line">yet?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SILENCE</div>
                              <div class="line">Dead, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Jesu, Jesu, dead! a' drew a good bow; and dead! a'</div>
                              <div class="line">shot a fine shoot: John a Gaunt loved him well, and</div>
                              <div class="line">betted much money on his head. Dead! a' would have</div>
                              <div class="line">clapped i' the clout at twelve score; and carried</div>
                              <div class="line">you a forehand shaft a fourteen and fourteen and a</div>
                              <div class="line">half, that it would have done a man's heart good to</div>
                              <div class="line">see. How a score of ewes now?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SILENCE</div>
                              <div class="line">Thereafter as they be: a score of good ewes may be</div>
                              <div class="line">worth ten pounds.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">And is old Double dead?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SILENCE</div>
                              <div class="line">Here come two of Sir John Falstaff's men, as I think.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter BARDOLPH and one with him</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">Good morrow, honest gentlemen: I beseech you, which</div>
                              <div class="line">is Justice Shallow?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">I am Robert Shallow, sir; a poor esquire of this</div>
                              <div class="line">county, and one of the king's justices of the peace:</div>
                              <div class="line">What is your good pleasure with me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">My captain, sir, commends him to you; my captain,</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir John Falstaff, a tall gentleman, by heaven, and</div>
                              <div class="line">a most gallant leader.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">He greets me well, sir. I knew him a good backsword</div>
                              <div class="line">man. How doth the good knight? may I ask how my</div>
                              <div class="line">lady his wife doth?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, pardon; a soldier is better accommodated than</div>
                              <div class="line">with a wife.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">It is well said, in faith, sir; and it is well said</div>
                              <div class="line">indeed too. Better accommodated! it is good; yea,</div>
                              <div class="line">indeed, is it: good phrases are surely, and ever</div>
                              <div class="line">were, very commendable. Accommodated! it comes of</div>
                              <div class="line">'accommodo' very good; a good phrase.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">Pardon me, sir; I have heard the word. Phrase call</div>
                              <div class="line">you it? by this good day, I know not the phrase;</div>
                              <div class="line">but I will maintain the word with my sword to be a</div>
                              <div class="line">soldier-like word, and a word of exceeding good</div>
                              <div class="line">command, by heaven. Accommodated; that is, when a</div>
                              <div class="line">man is, as they say, accommodated; or when a man is,</div>
                              <div class="line">being, whereby a' may be thought to be accommodated;</div>
                              <div class="line">which is an excellent thing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">It is very just.</div>
                              <p>Enter FALSTAFF</p>
                              <div class="line">Look, here comes good Sir John. Give me your good</div>
                              <div class="line">hand, give me your worship's good hand: by my</div>
                              <div class="line">troth, you like well and bear your years very well:</div>
                              <div class="line">welcome, good Sir John.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">I am glad to see you well, good Master Robert</div>
                              <div class="line">Shallow: Master Surecard, as I think?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">No, Sir John; it is my cousin Silence, in commission with me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Good Master Silence, it well befits you should be of</div>
                              <div class="line">the peace.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SILENCE</div>
                              <div class="line">Your good-worship is welcome.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Fie! this is hot weather, gentlemen. Have you</div>
                              <div class="line">provided me here half a dozen sufficient men?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, have we, sir. Will you sit?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me see them, I beseech you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Where's the roll? where's the roll? where's the</div>
                              <div class="line">roll? Let me see, let me see, let me see. So, so:</div>
                              <div class="line">yea, marry, sir: Ralph Mouldy! Let them appear as</div>
                              <div class="line">I call; let them do so, let them do so. Let me</div>
                              <div class="line">see; where is Mouldy?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOULDY</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, an't please you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">What think you, Sir John? a good-limbed fellow;</div>
                              <div class="line">young, strong, and of good friends.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Is thy name Mouldy?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOULDY</div>
                              <div class="line">Yea, an't please you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis the more time thou wert used.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha, ha, ha! most excellent, i' faith! Things that</div>
                              <div class="line">are mouldy lack use: very singular good! in faith,</div>
                              <div class="line">well said, Sir John, very well said.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Prick him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOULDY</div>
                              <div class="line">I was pricked well enough before, an you could have</div>
                              <div class="line">let me alone: my old dame will be undone now for</div>
                              <div class="line">one to do her husbandry and her drudgery: you need</div>
                              <div class="line">not to have pricked me; there are other men fitter</div>
                              <div class="line">to go out than I.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Go to: peace, Mouldy; you shall go. Mouldy, it is</div>
                              <div class="line">time you were spent.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOULDY</div>
                              <div class="line">Spent!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Peace, fellow, peace; stand aside: know you where</div>
                              <div class="line">you are? For the other, Sir John: let me see:</div>
                              <div class="line">Simon Shadow!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Yea, marry, let me have him to sit under: he's like</div>
                              <div class="line">to be a cold soldier.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Where's Shadow?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHADOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Shadow, whose son art thou?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHADOW</div>
                              <div class="line">My mother's son, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy mother's son! like enough, and thy father's</div>
                              <div class="line">shadow: so the son of the female is the shadow of</div>
                              <div class="line">the male: it is often so, indeed; but much of the</div>
                              <div class="line">father's substance!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you like him, Sir John?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Shadow will serve for summer; prick him, for we have</div>
                              <div class="line">a number of shadows to fill up the muster-book.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Thomas Wart!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Where's he?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WART</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Is thy name Wart?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WART</div>
                              <div class="line">Yea, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art a very ragged wart.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall I prick him down, Sir John?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">It were superfluous; for his apparel is built upon</div>
                              <div class="line">his back and the whole frame stands upon pins:</div>
                              <div class="line">prick him no more.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha, ha, ha! you can do it, sir; you can do it: I</div>
                              <div class="line">commend you well. Francis Feeble!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FEEBLE</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">What trade art thou, Feeble?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FEEBLE</div>
                              <div class="line">A woman's tailor, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall I prick him, sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">You may: but if he had been a man's tailor, he'ld</div>
                              <div class="line">ha' pricked you. Wilt thou make as many holes in</div>
                              <div class="line">an enemy's battle as thou hast done in a woman's petticoat?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FEEBLE</div>
                              <div class="line">I will do my good will, sir; you can have no more.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Well said, good woman's tailor! well said,</div>
                              <div class="line">courageous Feeble! thou wilt be as valiant as the</div>
                              <div class="line">wrathful dove or most magnanimous mouse. Prick the</div>
                              <div class="line">woman's tailor: well, Master Shallow; deep, Master Shallow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FEEBLE</div>
                              <div class="line">I would Wart might have gone, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">I would thou wert a man's tailor, that thou mightst</div>
                              <div class="line">mend him and make him fit to go. I cannot put him</div>
                              <div class="line">to a private soldier that is the leader of so many</div>
                              <div class="line">thousands: let that suffice, most forcible Feeble.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FEEBLE</div>
                              <div class="line">It shall suffice, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">I am bound to thee, reverend Feeble. Who is next?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Peter Bullcalf o' the green!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Yea, marry, let's see Bullcalf.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BULLCALF</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">'Fore God, a likely fellow! Come, prick me Bullcalf</div>
                              <div class="line">till he roar again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BULLCALF</div>
                              <div class="line">O Lord! good my lord captain,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">What, dost thou roar before thou art pricked?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BULLCALF</div>
                              <div class="line">O Lord, sir! I am a diseased man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">What disease hast thou?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BULLCALF</div>
                              <div class="line">A whoreson cold, sir, a cough, sir, which I caught</div>
                              <div class="line">with ringing in the king's affairs upon his</div>
                              <div class="line">coronation-day, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, thou shalt go to the wars in a gown; we wilt</div>
                              <div class="line">have away thy cold; and I will take such order that</div>
                              <div class="line">my friends shall ring for thee. Is here all?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Here is two more called than your number, you must</div>
                              <div class="line">have but four here, sir: and so, I pray you, go in</div>
                              <div class="line">with me to dinner.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, I will go drink with you, but I cannot tarry</div>
                              <div class="line">dinner. I am glad to see you, by my troth, Master Shallow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">O, Sir John, do you remember since we lay all night</div>
                              <div class="line">in the windmill in Saint George's field?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">No more of that, good Master Shallow, no more of that.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha! 'twas a merry night. And is Jane Nightwork alive?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">She lives, Master Shallow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">She never could away with me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Never, never; she would always say she could not</div>
                              <div class="line">abide Master Shallow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">By the mass, I could anger her to the heart. She</div>
                              <div class="line">was then a bona-roba. Doth she hold her own well?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Old, old, Master Shallow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, she must be old; she cannot choose but be old;</div>
                              <div class="line">certain she's old; and had Robin Nightwork by old</div>
                              <div class="line">Nightwork before I came to Clement's Inn.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SILENCE</div>
                              <div class="line">That's fifty-five year ago.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha, cousin Silence, that thou hadst seen that that</div>
                              <div class="line">this knight and I have seen! Ha, Sir John, said I well?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">We have heard the chimes at midnight, Master Shallow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">That we have, that we have, that we have; in faith,</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir John, we have: our watch-word was 'Hem boys!'</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, let's to dinner; come, let's to dinner:</div>
                              <div class="line">Jesus, the days that we have seen! Come, come.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt FALSTAFF and Justices</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BULLCALF</div>
                              <div class="line">Good Master Corporate Bardolph, stand my friend;</div>
                              <div class="line">and here's four Harry ten shillings in French crowns</div>
                              <div class="line">for you. In very truth, sir, I had as lief be</div>
                              <div class="line">hanged, sir, as go: and yet, for mine own part, sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">I do not care; but rather, because I am unwilling,</div>
                              <div class="line">and, for mine own part, have a desire to stay with</div>
                              <div class="line">my friends; else, sir, I did not care, for mine own</div>
                              <div class="line">part, so much.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">Go to; stand aside.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOULDY</div>
                              <div class="line">And, good master corporal captain, for my old</div>
                              <div class="line">dame's sake, stand my friend: she has nobody to do</div>
                              <div class="line">any thing about her when I am gone; and she is old,</div>
                              <div class="line">and cannot help herself: You shall have forty, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">Go to; stand aside.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FEEBLE</div>
                              <div class="line">By my troth, I care not; a man can die but once: we</div>
                              <div class="line">owe God a death: I'll ne'er bear a base mind:</div>
                              <div class="line">an't be my destiny, so; an't be not, so: no man is</div>
                              <div class="line">too good to serve's prince; and let it go which way</div>
                              <div class="line">it will, he that dies this year is quit for the next.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">Well said; thou'rt a good fellow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FEEBLE</div>
                              <div class="line">Faith, I'll bear no base mind.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter FALSTAFF and the Justices</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, sir, which men shall I have?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Four of which you please.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, a word with you: I have three pound to free</div>
                              <div class="line">Mouldy and Bullcalf.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Go to; well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, Sir John, which four will you have?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you choose for me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, then, Mouldy, Bullcalf, Feeble and Shadow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Mouldy and Bullcalf: for you, Mouldy, stay at home</div>
                              <div class="line">till you are past service: and for your part,</div>
                              <div class="line">Bullcalf, grow till you come unto it: I will none of you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir John, Sir John, do not yourself wrong: they are</div>
                              <div class="line">your likeliest men, and I would have you served with the best.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Will you tell me, Master Shallow, how to choose a</div>
                              <div class="line">man? Care I for the limb, the thewes, the stature,</div>
                              <div class="line">bulk, and big assemblance of a man! Give me the</div>
                              <div class="line">spirit, Master Shallow. Here's Wart; you see what a</div>
                              <div class="line">ragged appearance it is; a' shall charge you and</div>
                              <div class="line">discharge you with the motion of a pewterer's</div>
                              <div class="line">hammer, come off and on swifter than he that gibbets</div>
                              <div class="line">on the brewer's bucket. And this same half-faced</div>
                              <div class="line">fellow, Shadow; give me this man: he presents no</div>
                              <div class="line">mark to the enemy; the foeman may with as great aim</div>
                              <div class="line">level at the edge of a penknife. And for a retreat;</div>
                              <div class="line">how swiftly will this Feeble the woman's tailor run</div>
                              <div class="line">off! O, give me the spare men, and spare me the</div>
                              <div class="line">great ones. Put me a caliver into Wart's hand, Bardolph.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">Hold, Wart, traverse; thus, thus, thus.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, manage me your caliver. So: very well: go</div>
                              <div class="line">to: very good, exceeding good. O, give me always a</div>
                              <div class="line">little, lean, old, chapt, bald shot. Well said, i'</div>
                              <div class="line">faith, Wart; thou'rt a good scab: hold, there's a</div>
                              <div class="line">tester for thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">He is not his craft's master; he doth not do it</div>
                              <div class="line">right. I remember at Mile-end Green, when I lay at</div>
                              <div class="line">Clement's Inn--I was then Sir Dagonet in Arthur's</div>
                              <div class="line">show,--there was a little quiver fellow, and a'</div>
                              <div class="line">would manage you his piece thus; and a' would about</div>
                              <div class="line">and about, and come you in and come you in: 'rah,</div>
                              <div class="line">tah, tah,' would a' say; 'bounce' would a' say; and</div>
                              <div class="line">away again would a' go, and again would a' come: I</div>
                              <div class="line">shall ne'er see such a fellow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">These fellows will do well, Master Shallow. God</div>
                              <div class="line">keep you, Master Silence: I will not use many words</div>
                              <div class="line">with you. Fare you well, gentlemen both: I thank</div>
                              <div class="line">you: I must a dozen mile to-night. Bardolph, give</div>
                              <div class="line">the soldiers coats.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir John, the Lord bless you! God prosper your</div>
                              <div class="line">affairs! God send us peace! At your return visit</div>
                              <div class="line">our house; let our old acquaintance be renewed;</div>
                              <div class="line">peradventure I will with ye to the court.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">'Fore God, I would you would, Master Shallow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Go to; I have spoke at a word. God keep you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Fare you well, gentle gentlemen.</div>
                              <p>Exeunt Justices</p>
                              <div class="line">On, Bardolph; lead the men away.</div>
                              <p>Exeunt BARDOLPH, Recruits, &c</p>
                              <div class="line">As I return, I will fetch off these justices: I do</div>
                              <div class="line">see the bottom of Justice Shallow. Lord, Lord, how</div>
                              <div class="line">subject we old men are to this vice of lying! This</div>
                              <div class="line">same starved justice hath done nothing but prate to</div>
                              <div class="line">me of the wildness of his youth, and the feats he</div>
                              <div class="line">hath done about Turnbull Street: and every third</div>
                              <div class="line">word a lie, duer paid to the hearer than the Turk's</div>
                              <div class="line">tribute. I do remember him at Clement's Inn like a</div>
                              <div class="line">man made after supper of a cheese-paring: when a'</div>
                              <div class="line">was naked, he was, for all the world, like a forked</div>
                              <div class="line">radish, with a head fantastically carved upon it</div>
                              <div class="line">with a knife: a' was so forlorn, that his</div>
                              <div class="line">dimensions to any thick sight were invincible: a'</div>
                              <div class="line">was the very genius of famine; yet lecherous as a</div>
                              <div class="line">monkey, and the whores called him mandrake: a' came</div>
                              <div class="line">ever in the rearward of the fashion, and sung those</div>
                              <div class="line">tunes to the overscutched huswives that he heard the</div>
                              <div class="line">carmen whistle, and swear they were his fancies or</div>
                              <div class="line">his good-nights. And now is this Vice's dagger</div>
                              <div class="line">become a squire, and talks as familiarly of John a</div>
                              <div class="line">Gaunt as if he had been sworn brother to him; and</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll be sworn a' ne'er saw him but once in the</div>
                              <div class="line">Tilt-yard; and then he burst his head for crowding</div>
                              <div class="line">among the marshal's men. I saw it, and told John a</div>
                              <div class="line">Gaunt he beat his own name; for you might have</div>
                              <div class="line">thrust him and all his apparel into an eel-skin; the</div>
                              <div class="line">case of a treble hautboy was a mansion for him, a</div>
                              <div class="line">court: and now has he land and beefs. Well, I'll</div>
                              <div class="line">be acquainted with him, if I return; and it shall</div>
                              <div class="line">go hard but I will make him a philosopher's two</div>
                              <div class="line">stones to me: if the young dace be a bait for the</div>
